other_tests.findings: Gallbladder demonstrates a large amount of sludge mixed with tiny, echogenic shadowing stones, some of which appear impacted within the gallbladder neck. The gallbladder wall is not significantly thickened measuring up to 4 mm. There is a small amount of pericholecystic fluid. The CBD is unremarkable measuring up to 6 mm without definite choledocholithiasis.
